text: Pup means the babies of several species of animals, such as: *Bat *Dog *Other members of the canine family (a group of animals) *Fox *Mouse *Pig *Rat *Ring- tailed lemur *Seal *Shark *Stingray Pup could also mean: *Sopwith Pup, a biplane fighter aircraft with only one seat. It was used by the British in World War I
title: Pup
